sqlMap.select: select * from zc_eb_entrust t t.CO_CODE = #coCodeFilter#
select aer.role_id ORG_CODE,au.user_id ORG_NAME from as_user au ,as_emp_role aer where aer.emp_code=au.user_code and au.user_id=#dattr1:VARCHAR#
select org.ORG_CODE, org.ORG_NAME from as_org org where org.nd=#nd:INTEGER# and org.CO_CODE=#coCode:VARCHAR#

select * from zc_eb_entrust master where 1=1 master.ND=#nd:INTEGER# exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_TODO where executor=#executor# and instance_id = master.process_inst_id) exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_UNTREAD where executor=#executor# and instance_id = master.process_inst_id) exists (select instance_id from V_WF_ACTION_HISTORY_GK53 where executor =#executor# and instance_id = master.process_inst_id) and master.STATUS!= 'cancel' and master.STATUS != 'exec' ( exists (select WF_DRAFT_NAME from as_wf_draft where user_id=#executor# and compo_id=#wfcompoId# and WF_DRAFT_ID=master.process_inst_id) or master.process_inst_id = -1 ) and master.STATUS ='0' (master.STATUS='exec') 1=1 master.CO_CODE=#coCode:VARCHAR# order by master.ZC_INPUT_DATE desc
select * from zc_eb_entrust master master.status =#billStatus:VARCHAR#
select count(*) from zc_eb_entrust where sn = #sn#

SELECT E.SN, E.ZC_MAKE_CODE, E.ZC_MAKE_NAME, E.CO_CODE, E.ND, D.SUPERINTENDENT_NAME ZC_MAKE_LINKMAN, E.ZC_MAKE_TEL, E.STATUS, E.ZC_INPUT_CODE, E.ZC_INPUT_DATE, MAKE.PROJ_SUM ZC_MAKE_SUM, E. ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, E.REMARK, E.PROCESS_INST_ID, E.AGENCY, MAKE.Pur_Type ZC_PIFU_CGFS, E.AGENCY_NAME, E.ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, E.ZC_WEITO_DATE, E.ZC_IS_NOTARY, E.ZC_IS_IMP, E.ZC_IMP_FILE, E.ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID, E.UNTREAD_REASON, E.EXECUTE_DATE, E.LEADER_ID, E.LEADER_TEL, E.ORG_CODE FROM ZC_EB_ENTRUST E, ZC_EB_DUTY_AUDIT_SHEET D, V_ZC_P_PRO_MAKE MAKE, (SELECT MAX(T.EXECUTE_TIME) D, T.INSTANCE_ID INS FROM WF_ACTION_HISTORY T WHERE T.INSTANCE_ID IN (SELECT S.PROCESS_INST_ID FROM ZC_EB_DUTY_AUDIT_SHEET S) GROUP BY T.INSTANCE_ID) WH WHERE E.SN = D.SN AND MAKE.PROJ_CODE = E.Zc_Make_Code AND WH.INS = D.PROCESS_INST_ID AND D.STATUS = 'exec' e.zc_pifu_cgfs!=#zcText0# d.Superintendent=#executor# e.AGENCY=#coCode# ORDER BY WH.D DESC

SELECT E.SN, E.ZC_MAKE_CODE, E.ZC_MAKE_NAME, E.CO_CODE, m.co_name, E.ND, e.zc_make_linkman ZC_MAKE_LINKMAN, E.ZC_MAKE_TEL, E.STATUS, E.ZC_INPUT_CODE, E.ZC_INPUT_DATE, vm.PROJ_SUM - nvl(vp.usedBudget, 0) as ZC_MAKE_SUM, E.ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, E.REMARK, E.PROCESS_INST_ID, E.AGENCY, e.zc_pifu_cgfs, E.AGENCY_NAME, E.ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, E.ZC_WEITO_DATE, E.ZC_IS_NOTARY, E.ZC_IS_IMP, E.ZC_IMP_FILE, E.ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID, E.UNTREAD_REASON, E.EXECUTE_DATE, E.LEADER_ID, E.LEADER_TEL, E.ORG_CODE from ZC_EB_ENTRUST E , ma_company m ,v_zc_p_pro_make vm left join (select vp.zc_make_code, sum(vp.pack_budget) as usedBudget from v_zc_normal_pack vp group by vp.zc_make_code) vp on (vm.PROJ_CODE = vp.ZC_MAKE_CODE) where e.zc_make_code = vm.PROJ_CODE and not exists (select vv.zc_make_code, vv.usedBudget from (select vp.zc_make_code, sum(vp.pack_budget) as usedBudget from v_zc_normal_pack vp group by vp.zc_make_code) vv where vm.PROJ_CODE = vv.zc_make_code and vm.PROJ_SUM = vv.usedBudget) and e.status = 'exec' and e.is_shouli!='N' and e.nd = m.nd and e.co_code = m.co_code e.jbr=#executor# e.AGENCY=#coCode#

select SN, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_MAKE_NAME, CO_CODE, ND, ZC_MAKE_LINKMAN, ZC_MAKE_TEL, STATUS, ZC_INPUT_CODE, ZC_INPUT_DATE, ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, REMARK, PROCESS_INST_ID, AGENCY, ZC_PIFU_CGFS, AGENCY_NAME, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_WEITO_DATE, ZC_IS_NOTARY, ZC_IS_IMP, ZC_IMP_FILE, ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID, UNTREAD_REASON, EXECUTE_DATE, LEADER_ID, LEADER_TEL, ORG_CODE,IS_DES_SUP,IS_PUB,is_car,ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, JBR,JBR_NAME,XBR,XBR_NAME,IS_SHOULI from ( SELECT E.SN, E.ZC_MAKE_CODE, E.ZC_MAKE_NAME, E.CO_CODE, E.ND, ZC_EB_DUTY_AUDIT_SHEET.SUPERINTENDENT_NAME ZC_MAKE_LINKMAN, E.ZC_MAKE_TEL, E.STATUS, E.ZC_INPUT_CODE, E.ZC_INPUT_DATE, E.ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, E.REMARK, E.PROCESS_INST_ID, E.AGENCY AGENCY, E.ZC_PIFU_CGFS, E.AGENCY_NAME, E.ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, E.ZC_WEITO_DATE, E.ZC_IS_NOTARY, E.ZC_IS_IMP, E.ZC_IMP_FILE, E.ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID, E.UNTREAD_REASON, E.EXECUTE_DATE, E.LEADER_ID, E.LEADER_TEL, E.ORG_CODE,E.IS_DES_SUP,E.IS_PUB,E.is_car,E.ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, E.JBR,E.JBR_NAME,E.XBR,E.XBR_NAME,E.IS_SHOULI, WH.D EXECUTE_TIME FROM ZC_EB_ENTRUST E, ZC_EB_DUTY_AUDIT_SHEET ZC_EB_DUTY_AUDIT_SHEET, (SELECT MAX(T.EXECUTE_TIME) D, T.INSTANCE_ID INS FROM WF_ACTION_HISTORY T WHERE T.INSTANCE_ID IN (SELECT S.PROCESS_INST_ID FROM ZC_EB_DUTY_AUDIT_SHEET S) GROUP BY T.INSTANCE_ID) WH WHERE E.SN = ZC_EB_DUTY_AUDIT_SHEET.SN AND WH.INS = ZC_EB_DUTY_AUDIT_SHEET.PROCESS_INST_ID AND ZC_EB_DUTY_AUDIT_SHEET.STATUS = 'exec' AND e.sn NOT IN (SELECT protocol.sn FROM zc_eb_protocol protocol) e.zc_pifu_cgfs!=#zcText0# ZC_EB_DUTY_AUDIT_SHEET.Superintendent=#executor# e.AGENCY=#coCode# )where 1=1 ORDER BY EXECUTE_TIME DESC

SELECT E.SN, E.ZC_MAKE_CODE, E.ZC_MAKE_NAME, E.CO_CODE, E.ND, D.SUPERINTENDENT_NAME ZC_MAKE_LINKMAN, E.ZC_MAKE_TEL, E.STATUS, E.ZC_INPUT_CODE, E.ZC_INPUT_DATE, E.ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, E.REMARK, E.PROCESS_INST_ID, E.AGENCY, E.ZC_PIFU_CGFS, E.AGENCY_NAME, E.ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, E.ZC_WEITO_DATE, E.ZC_IS_NOTARY, E.ZC_IS_IMP, E.ZC_IMP_FILE, E.ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID, E.UNTREAD_REASON, E.EXECUTE_DATE, E.LEADER_ID, E.LEADER_TEL, E.ORG_CODE,e.IS_DES_SUP,E.IS_PUB,E.is_car,E.ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, E.JBR,E.JBR_NAME,E.XBR,E.XBR_NAME FROM ZC_EB_ENTRUST E, ZC_EB_DUTY_AUDIT_SHEET D, (SELECT MAX(T.EXECUTE_TIME) D, T.INSTANCE_ID INS FROM WF_ACTION_HISTORY T WHERE T.INSTANCE_ID IN (SELECT S.PROCESS_INST_ID FROM ZC_EB_DUTY_AUDIT_SHEET S) GROUP BY T.INSTANCE_ID) WH WHERE E.SN = D.SN AND WH.INS = D.PROCESS_INST_ID AND D.STATUS = 'exec' AND e.sn NOT IN (SELECT protocol.sn FROM zc_eb_protocol protocol) AND e.sn NOT IN (SELECT req.sn FROM zc_eb_requirement req) e.zc_pifu_cgfs!=#zcText0# d.Superintendent=#executor# e.AGENCY=#coCode# ORDER BY WH.D DESC
select * from zc_eb_entrust_detail where sn=#value# order by SND

select * from zc_eb_entrust_detail ed where sn=#zcText0# and not exists (select snd from zc_eb_requirement_detail where snd=ed.snd and sn=ed.sn req_code!=#zcText2# ) and snd not in ($zcText3$) order by SND
select * from zc_eb_entrust where zc_make_code=#value#
select * from zc_eb_entrust where sn=#value#
select * from zc_eb_entrust where PROCESS_INST_ID=#value#
select * from zc_eb_entrust where sn_code=#value#
select zt.* from zc_eb_entrust zt, zc_eb_pack pack where pack.entrust_code = zt.sn and pack.proj_code = #value# and rownum=1
select * from zc_eb_entrust_detail where SN=#zcText0# order by SND
sqlMap.update: update zc_eb_entrust set status=#status:VARCHAR#, PROCESS_INST_ID=#processInstId#, EXECUTE_DATE=#executeDate:DATE# where sn=#sn:VARCHAR#

update ZC_EB_ENTRUST set ZC_MAKE_CODE = #zcMakeCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_MAKE_NAME = #zcMakeName:VARCHAR#, CO_CODE = #coCode:VARCHAR#, ND = #nd:CHAR#, ZC_MAKE_LINKMAN = #zcMakeLinkman:VARCHAR#, ZC_MAKE_TEL = #zcMakeTel:VARCHAR#, STATUS = #status:VARCHAR#, ZC_INPUT_CODE = #zcInputCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_INPUT_DATE = #zcInputDate:DATE#, ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM = #zcMoneyBiSum:DECIMAL#, REMARK = #remark:VARCHAR#, PROCESS_INST_ID = #processInstId:DECIMAL#, AGENCY = #agency:VARCHAR#, ZC_PIFU_CGFS = #zcPifuCgfs:VARCHAR#, AGENCY_NAME = #agencyName:VARCHAR#, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA = #zcDiyuDaima:VARCHAR#, ZC_WEITO_DATE = #zcWeitoDate:DATE#, ZC_IS_NOTARY = #zcIsNotary:VARCHAR#, ZC_IS_IMP = #zcIsImp:VARCHAR#, ZC_IMP_FILE = #zcImpFile:VARCHAR#, ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID = #zcImpFileBlobid:VARCHAR#, UNTREAD_REASON = #untreadReason:VARCHAR#, EXECUTE_DATE = #executeDate:DATE#, LEADER_ID = #leaderId:VARCHAR#, LEADER_TEL = #leaderTel:VARCHAR#, ORG_CODE = #orgCode:VARCHAR#, EXECUTOR = #executor:VARCHAR#, SN_CODE = #snCode:VARCHAR#, IS_DES_SUP = #isDesSup:VARCHAR#, IS_PUB = #isPub:VARCHAR#, ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE = #zcFukuanType:VARCHAR#, IS_CAR = #isCar:VARCHAR#, JBR= #jbr:VARCHAR#, JBR_NAME = #jbrName:VARCHAR#, XBR = #xbr:VARCHAR#, XBR_NAME = #xbrName:VARCHAR#, IS_SHOULI=#isShouli# where SN = #sn:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select * from zc_eb_entrust master sn=#idList[]# for update
select * from zc_eb_entrust_detail master sn=#idList[]#
SELECT * FROM ZC_EB_ENTRUST F ORDER BY F.ZC_INPUT_DATE DESC

SELECT F.* FROM ZC_EB_ENTRUST F, (select zerp.entrust_code, sum(case zerp.bid_sum when 0 then case zerp.status when '5' then 0 else zerp.pack_budget end else zerp.bid_sum end) budget from zc_eb_req_pack zerp where zerp.status != 'cancel' group by zerp.entrust_code) pack where F.Status='2' and F.Co_Code=#coCode# and f.sn=pack.entrust_code(+) and (pack.budget is null or f.zc_money_bi_sum>pack.budget) and exists (select sheet.sn from zc_eb_duty_audit_sheet sheet where sheet.sn = f.sn and sheet.superintendent is not null ) ORDER BY F.ZC_INPUT_DATE DESC
select * from zc_eb_entrust_detail where sn = #SN#
select * from zc_eb_entrust_detail where sn = #zcText1#
sqlMap.insert: insert into ZC_EB_ENTRUST (SN, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_MAKE_NAME, CO_CODE, ND, ZC_MAKE_LINKMAN, ZC_MAKE_TEL, STATUS, ZC_INPUT_CODE, ZC_INPUT_DATE, ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, REMARK, PROCESS_INST_ID, AGENCY, ZC_PIFU_CGFS, AGENCY_NAME, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_WEITO_DATE, ZC_IS_NOTARY, ZC_IS_IMP, ZC_IMP_FILE, ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID, UNTREAD_REASON, EXECUTE_DATE, LEADER_ID, LEADER_TEL, ORG_CODE, EXECUTOR, SN_CODE, IS_DES_SUP, IS_PUB, ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, IS_CAR,JBR,JBR_NAME,XBR,XBR_NAME,IS_SHOULI ) values (#sn:VARCHAR#, #zcMakeCode:VARCHAR#, #zcMakeName:VARCHAR#, #coCode:VARCHAR#, #nd:CHAR#, #zcMakeLinkman:VARCHAR#, #zcMakeTel:VARCHAR#, #status:VARCHAR#, #zcInputCode:VARCHAR#, #zcInputDate:DATE#, #zcMoneyBiSum:DECIMAL#, #remark:VARCHAR#, #processInstId:DECIMAL#, #agency:VARCHAR#, #zcPifuCgfs:VARCHAR#, #agencyName:VARCHAR#, #zcDiyuDaima:VARCHAR#, #zcWeitoDate:DATE#, #zcIsNotary:VARCHAR#, #zcIsImp:VARCHAR#, #zcImpFile:VARCHAR#, #zcImpFileBlobid:VARCHAR#, #untreadReason:VARCHAR#, #executeDate:DATE#, #leaderId:VARCHAR#, #leaderTel:VARCHAR#, #orgCode:VARCHAR#, #executor:VARCHAR#, #snCode:VARCHAR#, #isDesSup:VARCHAR#, #isPub:VARCHAR#, #zcFukuanType:VARCHAR#, #isCar:VARCHAR#, #jbr:VARCHAR#, #jbrName:VARCHAR#, #xbr:VARCHAR#, #xbrName:VARCHAR#,#isShouli# )

insert into ZC_EB_ENTRUST_DETAIL (SND, SN, ZC_YEAR, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_PITEM_NAME, ZC_PITEM_ARR_DATE, ZC_BASE_GGYQ, ZC_PITEM_ATTACH, ZC_PITEM_ATTACH_BLOBID, ZC_CAIG_NUM, ZC_ITEM_SUM, ZC_MER_PRICE, BUDGET_BI_MONEY, BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY, ZC_CAIG_UNIT) values (#snd:VARCHAR#, #sn:VARCHAR#, #zcYear:CHAR#, #zcCatalogueCode:VARCHAR#, #zcCatalogueName:VARCHAR#, #zcPitemName:VARCHAR#, #zcPitemArrDate:DATE#, #zcBaseGgyq:VARCHAR#, #zcPitemAttach:VARCHAR#, #zcPitemAttachBlobid:VARCHAR#, #zcCaigNum:DECIMAL#, #zcItemSum:DECIMAL#, #zcMerPrice:DECIMAL#, #budgetBiMoney:DECIMAL#, #budgetOtherMoney:DECIMAL#, #zcCaigUnit:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.select: select e.* from zc_eb_entrust e, zc_eb_duty_audit_sheet d,ZC_EB_REQUIREMENT req where e.sn=d.sn and d.status='exec' and e.sn = req.sn(+) and req.sn is null e.zc_pifu_cgfs!=#zcText0# order by e.zc_input_date desc
SELECT e.* FROM ZC_EB_ENTRUST E,zc_eb_duty_audit_sheet sh where e.sn = sh.sn sh.superintendent = #userId# sh.sn = #zcText0# order by e.zc_input_code desc
select * from zc_eb_entrust m, zc_eb_duty_audit_sheet s where m.sn=s.sn m.ND=#nd:INTEGER# s.SUPERINTENDENT_ORG=#orgCode#
